                    <guid isPermaLink="false">b5a68d1b-b001-4766-8016-e188180fab21</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/tackling-the-usage-of-drm-and-textbooks/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>Tackling the usage of DRM and textbooks</title>
<description>Tony McSherry looks at DRM and the electronic publishing of textbooks.</description>
<pubDate>Wed, 22 Jan 2014 01:13:00 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Tony McSherry</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
                            <item>
                    <guid isPermaLink="false">19b1d787-d3e0-4287-9445-382466c5b2c0</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/twitter-quietly-switches-off-http-connections-to-api/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>Twitter quietly switches off HTTP connections to API</title>
<description>If your Twitter API requests were having issues over the past couple of days, changing to an SSL connection should fix your problems.</description>
<pubDate>Fri, 17 Jan 2014 05:35:38 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Chris Duckett</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
                            <item>
                    <guid isPermaLink="false">04509514-01bf-48a0-8783-0ca3a8db78dc</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/4g-to-the-rescue-from-slow-broadband-upload-speeds/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>4G to the rescue from slow broadband upload speeds</title>
<description>Wireless-N routers and adapters can give your network a speed boost, but the more connections you have in-house, the slower you go. If you need better upload speeds, consider your 4G phone.</description>
<pubDate>Wed, 15 Jan 2014 22:04:33 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Tony McSherry</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
                            <item>
                    <guid isPermaLink="false">09b53c65-c693-4aab-b27d-8555a646a6d7</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/catch-up-on-linuxconfau-2014/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>Catch up on Linux.conf.au 2014</title>
<description>If you failed to make the trip to Perth for LCA this year, you are able to watch most of the talks online.</description>
<pubDate>Tue, 14 Jan 2014 00:55:00 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Chris Duckett</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
                            <item>
                    <guid isPermaLink="false">905ef313-bf35-4a6a-b785-fd8d29938e41</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/an-exercise-in-fragmentation-limiting-android-installs-to-device-models/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>An exercise in fragmentation: Limiting Android installs to device models</title>
<description>As if there were not enough fragmentation issues with Android, app makers go out and make it worse when they limit installations to specific devices.</description>
<pubDate>Wed, 18 Dec 2013 22:21:00 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Chris Duckett</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
                            <item>
                    <guid isPermaLink="false">70da5fd8-9c00-4107-97f9-513bd2373901</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/australian-enterprises-turn-focus-from-byod-to-apps/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>Australian enterprises turn focus from BYOD to apps</title>
<description>Having come to grips with consumerisation and BYOD entering the marketplace, Australian businesses have set their target on creating apps to serve internal and external customers.</description>
<pubDate>Mon, 09 Dec 2013 00:13:23 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Chris Duckett</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
                            <item>
                    <guid isPermaLink="false">0b8e24f0-c671-49f2-8803-3b0ff9d15ae1</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/good-accessibility-is-good-web-page-design/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>Good accessibility is good web page design</title>
<description>Accessibility isn't something that should be added onto a web page, it should be baked in.</description>
<pubDate>Wed, 04 Dec 2013 00:55:00 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Chris Duckett</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
                            <item>
                    <guid isPermaLink="false">883e8132-feb9-4a81-adc0-c1e7db6cbc52</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/take-your-app-on-the-road-put-it-in-a-car/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>Take your app on the road, put it in a car</title>
<description>Looking for a new market or adding a unique edge to your app? Then support for in-car usage could be just the ticket.</description>
<pubDate>Wed, 27 Nov 2013 03:38:21 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Chris Duckett</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
                            <item>
                    <guid isPermaLink="false">852a80f4-b0c9-4106-a4ac-ba9d9f740310</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/navigating-the-morass-of-systemd-networkmanager-and-gnome-310/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>Navigating the morass of systemd, NetworkManager, and GNOME 3.10</title>
<description>The world of Linux: Where making a laptop engage its wired connection when attached to a dock is an exercise in frustration.</description>
<pubDate>Thu, 21 Nov 2013 00:02:00 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Chris Duckett</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
                            <item>
                    <guid isPermaLink="false">41232aa5-c108-4def-a9d9-1a0261a4884c</guid>
<link>https://www.techrepublic.com/article/google-opens-app-translation-service-to-all-android-devs/#ftag=RSS56d97e7</link>
<title>Google opens App Translation Service to all Android devs</title>
<description>Android developers are now able to purchase app translation services from the Android developer console.</description>
<pubDate>Tue, 12 Nov 2013 05:54:00 +0000</pubDate>
<media:credit role="author">Chris Duckett</media:credit><s:doctype>Text</s:doctype></item>
